description:
In this course, i will teach you how to create a Google plus page for your brand and ultimate ways to market, attract and maintain millions of followers .

There will be a 100% price increase after 2 weeks (From 1st July 2015)

This course is appropriate for beginners, Intermediate and advanced learners or anyone who wanted to gain indepth knowledge about Google plus business page .

I will show you all components, settings, features and unique offerings which Google provide you for free so that you can make a strong digital presence for your brand thus make more money through this digital social platform.

I will also share you some unique strategies which I have developed over years to increase your brand visibility through your Google plus page.

I will cover the following topics in this course

  • Why Google Plus
  • Basic Google account creation
  • Creating and developing your Google plus page
  • Social interactive features
  • Express yourself by posting contents
  • Page Management
  • YouTube Integration
  • Advanced Settings
  • Unique Tips
title: Google Plus For Business-An Ultimate Guide
